--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Dale Emery <dale@...> wrote:
> Alas, I've ne=
ver worked on an Eclipse plugin. The closest I've come was an RCP app, and =
at the time (several years ago) I couldn't find a good way to run through-t=
he-UI tests for that.

Ok, thanks anyway. Just to clarify though - it's not=
 a plugin for Eclipse - it's an app built using the osgi framework. It's ea=
sy to reproduce - just create a simple/empty plugin project on Eclipse on M=
ac and a Junit testcase that shows a frame and uses Robot - and run that as=
 a plugin test.
